name: Rabbit in Autumn
description:
The adventures of a rabbit. So cozy is the home place, but the bunnys got lost. 

You have to bring them home. But be careful, that are kids and need your guide.

Optimized for Controller Gaming.

Alternative is Keyboard and Mouse!

WASD / Arrows: Movement

Space, Left Mouse Button: Jump

E / Right Mouse Button: Attack 1

Escape / Backspace: Pause Menu

--------

Warning: Loading Screen is not working nice. So game is never crashed in my play tests, but sometimes everything calculating needs a while. Be patient and no worry!

--------

This game is a prototype, developed for the cozy autumn gamejam in 2 weeks. Sorry, no time was for a better storytelling. I had much to do with making a procedual maze in the terrain, make the bunnys running home with you proper on a dynamic navmesh and make the gamemechanik and the level structure progressive and amazing. I am happy with my result, and beeing part of this gamejam community was all. Let's see who like to play this bunny game.

Please dont hesitate to give feedback how the game is running on your environment and how you like it and what you miss for a full game.

A final version will be made if any people have fun to explore more of the rabbits world.

-------

The bunnys are in memoriam of our beloved Beetle & Juice bunnys we had more then 8 years at home.

The music and sound FX is from my alter ego Richard Steinschlag (DJ & Producer, electronic Stuff)
